content: this doily pattern has 19 rounds and measures about 10 i ve updated the original starlight doily pattern with new instructions and a few very small changes made to the doily the original pattern can still be found here- https //www draiguna com/p/starlight html there are instructions for 2 different border styles starting on round 17 a picot border or alternate border with no picots a photo tutorial for the picot version is available here- https //www draiguna com/p/starlight-photo-tutorial html **materials needed** * size 10 crochet thread- about 100 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * 3-double_crochet cluster * 2-double_crochet decrease * 5-double_crochet decrease * 2-double_crochet cluster * picot
